initiated_at.description: The timestamp from the UI, when the transfer was initiated by the user, e.g. clicking the submit button

issuer.description: Client account ID of who initiated the transfer

oneOf.description: Alphanumeric ID of origin, e.g. safe uuid
Alphanumeric ID of destination, e.g. safe or bank uuid
Holds information about e.g. the original fr_transaction

client_id.description: The unique id that is generated by the POS for each http request.

oneOf.description: Amount that is being transferred from origin to destination
The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.
The origin and destination objects as jsonb BEFORE the transfer happened. Will be supplied from within database pg transaction.

from.description: The origin object (i.e. safe) BEFORE the transfer happened

account_number.description: Financial account number of the safe, which is mutable and not deduplicated

anyOf.description: A custom name for a financial account.
The specific Tillhub resource this account applies to (e.g. branch).

custom_id.description: The custom financial account identifier e.g. an account number.

anyOf.description: A custom cost center identifier.

oneOf.description: Alphanumeric ID of the location, e.g. branch, warehouse, or warehouse_shelf

limit_upper.description: Upper capacity or safety limit per currency

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

oneOf.description: A list of non-negative monetary values by currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

items.description: Current cash amount stored in the safe per currency

items.description: Describes a non-negative monetary value in a specific currency.

currency.description: The three letter [ISO currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) of this item.

transaction_id.description: A unique id given to all the logs belonging to one transaction/transfer. Will be supplied from within database pg transaction.

operation.description: Type of operation of this transfer. Will be supplied from within database pg transaction.

oneOf.description: Reason supplied from within database in case the pg transaction errored out.
